home2.description1: I'm a Software Developer with over 3 years of experience, passionate about building high-performance mobile applications and clean codebases.

aboutCard.quote: "Clean code always looks like it was written by someone who cares."

projects.subtitle: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.
projects.shtgoolDesc: Cross-platform quiz application with over 25,000 downloads. Features authentication and real-time database services. Built with Flutter, GetX, and Firebase.
projects.aqarakDesc: A mobile application for buying and renting real estate properties, featuring advanced search and listing filters. Built with Flutter, GetX, and Firebase.
projects.statusSaverDesc: A utility application designed to view and save WhatsApp statuses (images & videos) directly to the gallery. Built with Flutter, GetX, and Local Storage.
projects.diyaAlqalbDesc: Comprehensive application focused on intuitive UI and accessibility, with API updates for real-time data retrieval. Built with Flutter, GetX, and REST API.

footer.designedBy: Designed and Developed by Abdelmjid Yahya
